console.log(ethers.utils.formatEther(balance), "ETH");
const balance = await ethers.provider.getBalance("你的账户地址");
console.log(ethers.utils.formatEther(balance), "ETH");
const balance = await ethers.provider.getBalance("你的账户地址");
console.log(ethers.utils.formatEther(balance),"ETH");
const balance = await ethers.provider.getBalance("account");
